name: Spectreborne
description:
Created for the Lospec Jam 1 in 2 weeks. Some of the created/planned content was removed in order to meet the submission deadline, so I apologize for the story inconsistencies but that content will be released in the following weeks.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Z: Interact
  • X: Exorcise
  • C: Cancel Exorcism

Created with Vylocity

Credits

  • Mike Moe: Programming, Art, Design, Writing
  • DefCat: Music/Sounds, Design, Writing
  • Jorge Vecino Labajo: Art, Level Design
  • Satukilo: Art, Animation
  • Eugene Lamantine: Art
  • Kish: Art
  • ActiveCoder: Programming
